channel.title: NEEDING HELP ON ERROR! (reward rep++)

item.title: NEEDING HELP ON ERROR! (reward rep++)
item.dc:creator: @DAWIGG DAWIGG
item.description:
@DAWIGG wrote:

public void DragonLongSpecial(){
if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1305) {
if (playerLevel[playerMagic] >= 0)
if (spec >= 3)}
hitDiff = 24;
inCombat();
staticAnimation(248, absX, absY, 0);
setAnimation(1058);
actionTimer = 25;
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
spec -= 3; // Specs - By Sam Server
}
else {
sendMessage(“You need more special energy to do that.”); // Specs - By Sam Server
}
else {
sendMessage(“You Are Not Weilding A Dragon Long”);
}
}

Starting N0vaScape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594
----------------------------------------------------------------------------[br][size=1]Posted at: October 28, 2006, 04:49:49 PM[/size][hr]i followed everything and when i compiled i had these errors[/quote]

I dont want your RS money just some ***++ would be nice instead. Ok this is the issue for the first error:

-It says this because you need to put some sort of action under that void
I.E. public void hi()
{
sendMessage(“Hi”);
}

This is your problem… you dont have the void doing anything

-next error is I think try putting another “}” after it

-last error I beleive will be fixed when you do what i told you for number 2
